participant_1.name: Michaela
participant_1.personality: Michaela is nurturing and creative, with a passion for baking and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: I've a dogs. I'm scared of dying. Knitting is my passion. The county wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I love to bake cookies.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is practical and hands-on, with a strong affinity for nature and a desire for independence.
participant_2.background: I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. I am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. I just got a job working in a gas station. I was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

content.text: I enjoy working with my hands and I love gardening since I was a kid
I have a fear that I would like you to know that I am so terrified of clowns due to the childhood trauma
By the way I don’t know who are my Biological mother and father I have been adopted by two elderly
I’m currently working in a gas station
My father has been trying to put me on blind dates
What about you how is your life
